posts.title: How To Traumatize Your Children
posts.content: Make the most out of the precious time you have on this earth with your children by traumatizing them for life with this easy to follow instructional book. It utilizes 7 proven methods that apply to all parenting styles so kids everywhere can be forever scarred.

posts.title: Samurai Sword Gear Stick
posts.content: Dodge through traffic like a skilled warrior when you whiz through sluggish cars with help from the Samurai sword gear stick. As if driving a manual transmission vehicle wasn’t fun enough, this 10.5″ shift knob will make your daily commute that much more exciting.

posts.title: iPhone Battery & Gaming Controller
posts.content: Enjoy hours of entertainment while on go without draining your phone’s power using this iPhone battery and gaming controller. This console style controller facilitates gameplay and comes with a 1500 mAh battery ideal for long gaming sessions.

posts.title: Portable Underground Beach Vault
posts.content: Keep your valuables safe from potential thieves next time you hit the beach with the portable underground beach vault. Simple dig the vault into the sand and sit back and relax knowing your possessions will remain dry and hidden from strangers.

posts.title: Animated Scanning Cyborg Adult Mask
posts.content: Make your post-apocalyptic cyborg costume come to life by topping it off with this animated scanning cyborg adult mask. Simply download the accompanying app, hit play, and slide your smartphone inside of the mask to give off the appearance you have an actual cyborg eye!

posts.title: Samsung Curved 78″ 4K UHD Smart TV
posts.content: The Samsung curved 78″ 4K UHD smart TV will redefine the way you watch TV and movies. This WiFi enabled TV features a quantum dot display for unparalleled visuals and a curved screen that delivers an immersive experience with off-angle viewing.

posts.title: Thor’s Hammer Bottle Opener
posts.content: Pop open your heady brew like a mighty god by using Thor’s hammer bottle opener. Crafted out of solid metal, once Thor’s hammer is firmly in your grip you’ll be able to open up beverages with the speed and skill of an all-powerful deity if ye be worthy.

posts.title: Leatherman Style Multi-Tool
posts.content: Perform any random task the day throws at you with the greatest of ease using this Leatherman style multi-tool. This handy tool will fit comfortably in your pocket and features a multitude of tools including a bottle opener, knife, and spring assisted scissors.

posts.title: LED Pool Light
posts.content: Make your plain old pool resemble an exotic watering hole straight out of a travel magazine with the LED pool light. Once the LED light enters the scene, your pool takes on an entirely new look and feel as it’s lit up with vibrant color blends and amazing effects.

posts.title: Portable Roll-Out BBQ Grill
posts.content: Transform any campfire into a practical cooking area by laying your food on this portable roll-out BBQ grill. It features an incredibly simple roll-out design and comes with a size-adjustable stake stand for campfire setups that makes it easy to increase desired heat levels.

posts.title: Makeup Organizer Station
posts.content: Upgrade your beauty station by placing all your cosmetic products inside this makeup organizer station. Crafted from bamboo, it features a removable mirror, docking station for your tablet or smartphone, and comes coated with a stain-resistant sealant.

posts.title: Hydrofoil Wakeboard
posts.content: Experience the smoothest ride possible while you’re being towed across the water by riding atop the hydrofoil wakeboard. The hydrofoil lifts the rider over the water’s surface for an incredibly smooth and fun ride – even on choppy days.
